website_summaries.verdict: A good-quality powered subwoofer for a decent price. Good for those looking for really low bass sounds on a budget.
pros: Produces quality bass down to 25 hertz
Ideal for small to medium rooms
cons: Not as powerful as other powered subwoofers around the same price range

customer_reviews.title: Boom. This is overkill. I may buy another.
customer_reviews.text: I had the 8” version already — I bought it with a receiver and surround set many years ago — and that system works great. This was a present for my neighbors, they enjoy playing loud music until the early morning hours. Since my purchase, they close their door which mutes quite a bit of their sound and that makes me happy. This speaker did what 5 conversations didn’t do — got some respect from my noisy neighbors. Thank you Yamaha!!
customer_reviews.author: Some random IT guy

customer_reviews.title: ... connect it to my Yamaha ats-1070 sound bar sound perfect and great balance
customer_reviews.text: I got this Yamaha subwoofer and connect it to my Yamaha ats-1070 sound bar sound perfect and great balance. Subwoofer has deep base and so powerful, I turn just little 1/3 of volume and the sound is great. Pro. Good quality, sound great and great value.
customer_reviews.author: sethy

customer_reviews.title: Best suited for Movies in Smaller Rooms
customer_reviews.text: As with the rest of my Yamaha speakers, this sub sound great for movies, but not so much with music. Unsurprisingly, it sounds like it’s being pushed more than my 12” Polk subwoofer was. On the other hand, it seems to have tighter sounding bass. I could only recommend for movies in small to medium size rooms.
customer_reviews.author: ChesterMan85

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Powered Subwoofer at This Price Point
customer_reviews.text: Integrated into a 5.1 home theater system, this powered subwoofer produces bass response that is clear, tight, and smooth. It is not given to exaggerated boom or annoying lingering echo. The sound is particularly pleasant with film music. Attractive appearance as well, inconspicuous black.
customer_reviews.author: Handelian

customer_reviews.title: Sounds Great
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this on an older Denon AV receiver and it compliments my BA speakers perfectly. Easy to set up. Sounds great. I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard Kayye

customer_reviews.title: Thundering.
customer_reviews.text: Added to my viso sound bar and wow. My house rumbles when watching tv. And movies are amazing. Sci-fi movies are amazing. Even just regular tv shows are enhanced. You will have to adjust the level on back after a couple of days cause I had mine to high and was thundering over people talking lol. I set mine at 6 to 7 and right now seems good. Star Trek and Star Wars are great to hear ships rumble.
customer_reviews.author: William c.

customer_reviews.title: Yamaha , the quality , the reputation ,
customer_reviews.text: Had to replace my pioneer receiver , and my old Yamaha subwoofer bought back in 2009. I replaced the receiver with a newer pioneer receiver , but wasn't happy with it. I bought this Yamaha receiver which I love , had to stay with Yamaha and bought this subwoofer. Not only does it sound better than my last woofer but this is the exact same 100 watt system with the same 10" speaker but a better cone that really does make this woofer sound more bass E er !!! And with this 7.2 150 watt home theater sound system it just blows away my old set up. Sounds great with my Samsung 55" 4K TV , just wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: DeShadow

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed at all
customer_reviews.text: It's under powered for the cost and I removed the woofer and found the cheapest construction( small voice coil and cheap basket with paper cone)
customer_reviews.author: Geovany Duran

customer_reviews.title: Yamaha 10" 100W Powered Subwoofer - Black (NS-SW100BL)
customer_reviews.text: Already owning a Yamaha RX-V385 receiver, and always wanting a subwoofer, this unit appeared best and I was not disappointed! The unit sits on my floor to the front left of the room with 8" Monoprice flush wall mount speakers mounted at the ceiling at the back of the room. It can handle everything I've given it to this point, no surrendering, it just keeps pounding. Its install to the receiver is straight forward and using Amazon basics AV cables, all works well.
customer_reviews.author: drisley

customer_reviews.title: A definit upgrade!
customer_reviews.text: I previously had an decent subwoofer. When I got my new Denon receiver from Amazon a few months ago, I noticed it just wasn't putting out much. So I decided to upgrade. Let me tell you, this subwoofer is amazing! I had to cut back the volume for one. The lies on music with deep bass power the room. On orchestra music, the bass from drum and concert bass are so good. It did take. Some adjustments, but I highly recommend this. Only small drawback as others have mentioned is it has no auto on off. But you can solve this by getting a WiFi plug if you have Echos, ect.
customer_reviews.author: James Larken Smith

customer_reviews.title: They call me mr. Boombastic...
customer_reviews.text: Yeah this thing is an absolute Savage Beast! We literally Rock The Party That Rocks the body. I haven't any friends but it sure sounds good to me and I've recently created a few enemies but they are known as Neighbors. I never had a problem with any of the neighbors until this awesome subwoofer showed up and had to ruin everything. My life is finally Complete because I can irritate my neighbors at the same time enjoying life. I don't have a dog that's irritating and Barks all day long 24 hours a day but I got a system that bumps now and we are at War...lol
customer_reviews.author: S. MARCHETTA

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality LFE Driven Subwoofer
customer_reviews.text: You must know your connections before buying this. Look for LFE output in your receiver. It may be called pre-out. The subwoofer does not have red and black speaker connections. You will need a Subwoofer Cable (Amazon Basics is fine) to connect from the receiver to the subwoofer. Very effective bass for standard home theater system. I use with 5.1 system in my family room. At high volume setting from the receiver, you will rattle your house a bit. That said, I wish I didn't have to manually switch it off and on every time. And the volume control is manual. So, those are the drawbacks. It is ok for the price.
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: Good Solid Made Product
customer_reviews.text: Hooked this up to my receiver and it has fantastic sound. Paid a little more than I would have liked but it seems to be exactly what I want. Haven't used it much because its upstairs and we're in the process of turning that room into a media room so we're not up there much yet. I do recommend this speaker for anyone wanting a good deep bass for their music and or movies.
customer_reviews.author: dddd

customer_reviews.title: Monster Bass @ it's best! NO JOKE!!!
customer_reviews.text: First, let me just say, this is a very good powered subwoofer for any home theater system. Works well in low frequency range. No distortion at all. You would be very please with this 100 watt 10" monster, The ONLY drawback for this device is that there's no way to control the powering on & off except by manually pushing power button on the rear. You're not to connect it to any external controller for turning on & off, if you forget to press the power button on the rear cabinet, it'll stay on until you turn it off. I would still recommend purchasing!
customer_reviews.author: Milbro53

customer_reviews.title: Great sounding bass..easy set up!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this sub to connect to my Yamaha HTR-5990 AV receiver for home theater sound. It was very easy to setup utilizing Yamaha's YPAO technology with the optimizer microphone and 1 Mediabridge RCA subwoofer cable to connect the speaker (set at half volume) to the receiver. I had to adjust the bass volume on my receiver a little to get the sound I was looking for. My home theater system is now complete and the movies never sounded better. Only drawback is that the power button on this sub is on the back and sometimes I forget to turn it off.
customer_reviews.author: NormL

customer_reviews.title: Still love that Yamaha quality.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 10 inch version 100W sub after careful research and a great history of previous Yamaha experience with musical instruments and electronics...needless to say, I'm still VERY impressed with Yamaha quality.This thing RUMBLES my whole home,and gives an EXCELLENT quality sound at lower volumes to movies and music. Definitely worth every penny I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: randallerr

customer_reviews.title: Couldnt be happier!
customer_reviews.text: Great little sub! Took a bit of a chance in that i went by the reviews in making up my mind. Glad i did! This thing booms. Was an awesome addition to my bedroom sustem. Hooked it up to the soundbar and was immediately impressed with the clarity and crisp bass. So easy to add real bass to my set up i dont know why i waited so long. Dont hesitate, price to performance this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for my small theater
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my living room but now its down in the basement theater which is around 10 x 12 and it just fills the room, actually it could be considered perfect. I previously had an onkyo stock woofer which was a whole lot better. I initially put this in my living room which is probably 25 x 14 it worked but it was weak even on the max level. So Onkyo went up and Yamaha down
customer_reviews.author: Openball

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to like this subwoofer
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this subwoofer. I love the power button so it don't use power in stand by. My problem is that is just sounds really weak and when you push it past halfway it just it's clips. The grill don't come off so can't see the subwoofer. Other than that it's pretty okay. Also it's not made in Japan like i would of love to think it would of been.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Dotson Smiley

customer_reviews.title: Powerful sound..seemless control.
customer_reviews.text: Much more power than I would ever need. At half my house sounds like a movie theater. The best part of it is I also bought the accompanied sound bar and EVERYTHING works seamlessly with my TV to adjust..turn off and on...and use the simulated sound effects..sports..movie..surround and more that actually work.
customer_reviews.author: John Heard

customer_reviews.title: Yamaha and Audio Product - A Perfect Pair!
customer_reviews.text: You cannot go wrong when you buy a Yamaha audio product. After some research and deliberations I bought this sub only to be enthralled with the output. So much so that even the kids love the vibration it creates. It neatly tucks in to a corner of the room. Tiny but power packed. The low frequencies are very well amplified for rich detailing. No reason to not loveeeee it.
customer_reviews.author: Ranjit

customer_reviews.title: BASS! How low can you go?
customer_reviews.text: Our stock home theater woofer finally gave out, so we decided to just do without it for a while. Bad idea, everything sounded like hollow nothingness. After looking and comparing for days, I decided to spend a little more than I wanted on this, and I'm glad I did. It sounds so full, and deep. It really enriches the sound of movies, sports, and everything in between. Yamaha has always made great audio components, and apparently still do!
customer_reviews.author: Greg Baty

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sub, don't underestimate Yamaha
customer_reviews.text: Yea, so I have to turn it on and off. But it was the worth the savings to get the twisted port and Yamaha quality. Working with a five channel, front surround sound bar, this is a perfect pairing. Nice, bass that does not thump into the room like a thunderclap, yet is powerful and can be felt.
customer_reviews.author: Troy

customer_reviews.title: Great boost to an existing system
customer_reviews.text: Must have a subwoofer... We've been upgrading one piece at a time, and we bought a slightly under-powered 5 speaker set to go with our new receiver that was DRAMATICALLY improved with this little cube. Has a nice thump, had to turn down the thumper to about half to dial it in. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: bumbleb177

customer_reviews.title: Good sound!
customer_reviews.text: I got this sub to complement a whole Yamaha setup: receiver and speakers. Sound is great after doing the calibration for the room. Only downside is that you need to remember to turn it off when you are done. There is no pilot light on the front, only on the back side, so it's easy to forget!
customer_reviews.author: Buck Marley

customer_reviews.title: Performs as advertised!!
customer_reviews.text: I must say that I am Big on sound quality in a major way. So I've read reviews on this item positive and negative and I remember some complaining that this subwoofer does not perform. I'm not sure what they were connecting their speaker to, but when I turned mine on as it is connected to my Denon S540BT it exceeded expectation. Rich bass quality and it picks up all the low register sounds. Simply keep the setting half volume as suggested and the subwoofer does the rest. Your music and movies will be top tier sound quality without a doubt. I will be purchasing another one since I have 2 subwoofer outputs on my receiver.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Boom Boom Boom Boom.
customer_reviews.text: Had to replace old receiver, new one came with a sub pre-out and not an amped sub. That meant I couldn't use my old sub. So I bought this one, sub cleans up sound well allowing you to hear the bass, more so than the old one. That being said you won't be feeling the bass or shaking the room with this sub.
customer_reviews.author: R.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Quality 100%
customer_reviews.text: Researched for a long time and this Subwoofer was with the wait, no problems, well built and sound quality is great I'm very satisfied in every category
customer_reviews.author: Charley

customer_reviews.title: It's definitely a subwoofer
customer_reviews.text: Vary good subwoofer. It's a bit on the large side but does work vary well. I might have considered the 8 inch had I known more. It has a power on/off button with manual base adjustment knob.
customer_reviews.author: WatchDog

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Using this woofer in addition to the soundbar in my living room TV. I am a bit hard of hearing, and having the base of this woofer support my soundbar has really helped me hear dialog better and has made watching movies much more enjoyable.
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle

customer_reviews.title: This thing thumps
customer_reviews.text: This thing thumps, actually had to turn it down because I could feel {not hear} it on the other side of the house!! I've this hooked to a Yamaha HTR-6060BL 7.1-Channel Digital Home Theater and is plugged into the back couldn't be happier with its performance!! Yamaha has won yet another loyal customer...
customer_reviews.author: A Charlie brown

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Connected to my Yamaha ATS-1080 and sounds awesome with the Yamaha sub
customer_reviews.author: Nando

customer_reviews.title: Fast response and noise issue with this woofer
customer_reviews.text: This is my second woofer connect to my karaoke system, after connect this one I realize my old woofer is junk need to replace, this woofer is much faster in response time and lot less noise when I turn on receiver and microphone.
customer_reviews.author: Wen B. Chu

customer_reviews.title: booming bass at an affordable price
customer_reviews.text: Love the sound. The problem is with the auto save power feature. It turns off when the signal is too low and it gets annoying. I leave it powered on all the time. Not the best way to real with it but it works.
customer_reviews.author: Sonnyboo - PJR

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as Described
customer_reviews.text: Shipped very fast...extremely well packed...beautiful speaker!...bass quality is extremely clear and vibrant...I'm using it with a Yamaha 5.1 surround system and the quality is outstanding!...buy with confidence
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Control for the bass you like from your sound system
customer_reviews.text: This speaker will overload the listener with bass sound if that is what you are wanting. Not to my liking.... I enjoy this speaker for the quality of sound and the control it gives to your music and movies.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas Fillmann

customer_reviews.title: No automatic shut off
customer_reviews.text: Like other's have stated the sound quality is good but not having an automatic shut off is concerning. To manually shut it down I would have to crawl behind my HT cabinet so I basically have to leave it on all the time
customer_reviews.author: T. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Match product brands for easiest integration and hookup
customer_reviews.text: Fine Bass sound replacement for previous subwoofer. Easy hookup and integration with surround speakers from previous sound surround system. New Yamaha surround receiver matches perfectly with this Yahama subwoofer.
customer_reviews.author: Charles R McCoppin

customer_reviews.title: Pumps!
customer_reviews.text: Sounds really really good. Really pumps out the bass and makes my Bose speakers sound even better.
customer_reviews.author: tmartin259

customer_reviews.title: I'm impressed with this sub-woofer
customer_reviews.text: I'm really impressed with sound quality and performance of this sub-woofer. I believe there is no better quality for the money. :-) I highly recommend this woofer. Thank you Yamaha!!
customer_reviews.author: Miguel

customer_reviews.title: Very nice subwoofer and great value!
customer_reviews.text: This subwoofer is amazing. Plugged it to my Yamaha ATS 1080 sound bar and it sounds great. Only need to turn it halfway because anything higher rattles my windows. Music sounds awesome and Movies sound like I'm at the theater. Get this one over the smaller 8" model you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Poly101

customer_reviews.title: Really makes a difference
customer_reviews.text: I have this paired with another Yamaha smaller (8 in) subwoofer connected to my Yamaha receiver for 7.2 Surround. Sounds great-you will notice the difference. No rattling, really deep. My Livingroom is small this is perfect. 4 stars because the power button is in the back...
customer_reviews.author: YooperMI

customer_reviews.title: great addition to sound system
customer_reviews.text: picked up for 150, totally fixed the lack of bass I was getting through my setup. has too much bass though, I barely turn it up at all and you can really notice...
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth T.

customer_reviews.title: Product did not come with a subwoofer rca line...
customer_reviews.text: I like the product the sound is fantastic . However the system did not come with a subwoofer rca line . I had to order one in order for it to work . Besides that, the product is very good
customer_reviews.author: B. H. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good but should update design
customer_reviews.text: Nice design aesthetics eventhough unit is dated. Not having auto mode and that they recommend turning it off on long vavations is a great inconvenience.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised
customer_reviews.text: Based on the price, though I knew Yamaha had a great reputation; I was surprised by the quality, weight, fit and finish was similar to the subwoofer I replaced. A much higher priced unit that lasted 2.5 years with very limited use...
customer_reviews.author: DrProctor

customer_reviews.title: Powerfull sub woofer with reasonable price is here!
customer_reviews.text: I am having Yamaha receiver R-S202. So, I bought this sub woofer to enjoy all kind of music. That make my computer sound awesome. Definitely better than any 2.0 speaker in the market!
customer_reviews.author: Bangnhan87

customer_reviews.title: Simply a great sub
customer_reviews.text: The last sub I owned was a KLH powered sub. I've been without one for a while. This is awesome. It looks great. It sounds great, and I can rock my livingroom well with music/surround sound/movie magic.
customer_reviews.author: Ginzu3

customer_reviews.title: Not normal Yamaha quality
customer_reviews.text: As a Yamaha fan, was disappointed with this. Passive on/off did not work so always had to turn it on/off manually. No adjustable crossover level. Sound was decent, but no features.
customer_reviews.author: MATHEW MORGAN STONE

customer_reviews.title: Everyone needs more bass!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new subwoofer for home system. This matched perfectly with my Yamaha receiver. Very large so have a good spot for this, you will love it.
customer_reviews.author: K. Houghton

customer_reviews.title: subwoofer
customer_reviews.text: It arrived early which was great ! Programmed the surround sound with the other 5 speakers .... The result was just what we were looking for !
customer_reviews.author: longlaker

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup, good bass
customer_reviews.text: This integrated well with my Yamaha RX-V850 and provides the bass my mains are lacking. The setup and balancing was easy.
customer_reviews.author: Toyman

customer_reviews.title: Yamaha really knows how to make music sound good
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound quality girl subwoofer never heard anything like it
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: powerful
customer_reviews.text: adds a great new dimension to the system. I believe I would have been happy with the smaller one, but this is fine, and works perfectly with the Yamaha sound bar...
customer_reviews.author: BK Petty

customer_reviews.title: Solid Sound
customer_reviews.text: Like the ease of hooking up and the solid bass sound it produces with minimal power input. Ease of tuning is good too.
customer_reviews.author: Rodger Hara

customer_reviews.title: I love it, but the neighbors dont
customer_reviews.text: This thing is pretty nice i can feel it shake the whole house, however the neighbors arent enjoying it as much as i am. Any suggestions for reducing the boom that leaves my house without turning it down
customer_reviews.author: Angelo

customer_reviews.title: Great Subwoofer for the $$
customer_reviews.text: Unit is compact, good bass output for its size, if the room is large then upgrade to larger 12" product..
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Richards

customer_reviews.title: So far, it works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Have to replace my old one due to a lightning strike. Found this Yamaha one. Good price and it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent depending on application used.
customer_reviews.text: Not a good fit for a sound bar. I’m a huge fan of Yamaha products. I tried to pair this with a sound bar but it just didn’t have the sound quality. This unit really needs to be paired with a receiver that has EQ settings as there are none on this sub.
customer_reviews.author: ThatNWGuy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent subwoofer!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing subwoofer! I added it to my 5.1 system. And it is a such great complement! Just remember to buy a subwoofer cable with it as it doesn’t include that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Yamaha 10" NS-SW100BL sounds great.
customer_reviews.text: I am thrilled with this powered subwoofer. It has a great bass frequency response. I am pleased with this device!
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: It’s all about the bass.
customer_reviews.text: Completely changed (by upgrading) the sound quality of my home theater. The difference is night and day. I am VERY satisfied with this component.
customer_reviews.author: buck180

customer_reviews.title: Was better than we thought
customer_reviews.text: We were blown away by the quality of this subwoofer. Paired with our Denon amp it really rocks. For the price it’s amazing value for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Darren M. Sefton

customer_reviews.title: Deep sounding bass
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this subwoofer to replace my older sub. I am very pleased with the product. The shipping was fast and packaged firmly. Pros.. very deep bass, nice sound quality, very well built, great value for the money. Cons.. wish it could connect wireless, had remote to turn up. Overall this is a great product and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: James Medina

customer_reviews.title: Sounds awesome
customer_reviews.text: Sound is crisp and clear and bass is outstanding with my receiver, and movies and music sound awesome...Thank you Amazon and Yamaha...
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This subwoofer sounds awesome!! I love it. It was so reasonable in price. I highly recommend it. Sound is fabulous and so easy to hook up.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Clasen

customer_reviews.title: Easy and powerful! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Super easy installation. Great bass sound. Very deep and rich. Great value!!! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ramiro Saavedra

customer_reviews.title: Works great... just what we needed
customer_reviews.text: We needed a new one So much better with this new one 👏
customer_reviews.author: Judith A. Brumbaugh

customer_reviews.title: Amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sub for your home theater. Paired with 4 Bose 161 speakers. Yet to buy a new center Speaker but I’ll probably get a Bose. But this sub was shaking the floor and the sectional. Even impressed my wife. It’s a good looking unit too. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: G. James

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: Sent it back to get something with more power. You can do better for 20-30$ more.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Koehler

customer_reviews.title: Woofing Again
customer_reviews.text: Since it replaced a long-deceased component, I am quite pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Moss

customer_reviews.title: Quality sound!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift to my father and he really like it! No complain anything about quality of the sound.
customer_reviews.author: KenZend

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: I love this speaker. Sound quality is great. Bass is amazing with the Yamaha system I have.
customer_reviews.author: DKTECH

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I have this out in the party pavilion and it makes the music sound great. Easy hookup to stereo. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Ocklawaha eian

customer_reviews.title: Nice speaker, could use mire connection options.
customer_reviews.text: Works great once you find the right place in the room. Must use an RCA cable though, which can lose some signal if it is too long. An optical connector would solve that. Luckily my set up is under ten feet so signal loss is not a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Donald D.

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: This is a good subwoofer. I am glad I made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: CLAYDO

customer_reviews.title: Great Subwoofer
customer_reviews.text: Great sub, as long you have the right AV system, 8 ohms @100 watts, good seller
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: head banga
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the yamaha surround sound a couple years back and somehow misplaced my sub when I moved , bad to get a newer one and am glad I did ... makes all the difference in the world ! the sound is incredible- will get u in trouble if you live in apartments though
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality,  great value.
customer_reviews.text: Replaced an old infinity subwoofer, so old that the speaker fell apart. This Yamaha is a part of my av system and really broadens out the sound level. So much power that I keep the subwoofer volume around 20 percent. Replacing my av receiver next..Yamaha of course.
customer_reviews.author: Nc halfback

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Works n sounds great! Much potential I haven't been able to hear yet cuz I'm in an apt. Rumbles my movies n music nicely!
customer_reviews.author: ds

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Bass
customer_reviews.text: This thing shakes our den. It’s like being at the theater. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Easy connection
customer_reviews.text: Plugs right into my yamaha sound bar. Good base sound, good for movies. Have to turn volume diwn on it for music
customer_reviews.author: Brian H

customer_reviews.title: Sounds good
customer_reviews.text: I'm not an audiophile but I love it. Quality sound and good range for a fair price.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This speaker was exactly what I needed for my home theater system. Now it feels like I am at the movies, literally.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Logan

customer_reviews.title: Average performance but it is priced right
customer_reviews.text: Not the most powerful sub but not bad for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Johnemus Emmanuel

customer_reviews.title: Great powerful bass, one issue.
customer_reviews.text: Only dislike is that I often forget to turn the power off when I’m done using it. If it were plugged into my receiver it wouldn’t be a problem but it’s plugged in behind my couch. Sounds amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Kainwe_77

customer_reviews.title: Good for lower volumes, not so crisp at higher volumes
customer_reviews.text: Powerful bass, but not as crisp and clear as I was hoping it to be. At lower volumes, such as TV listening, it is great and adds a great depth of sound to sports and movies. Gets the job done for music
customer_reviews.author: Omar A

customer_reviews.title: High quality for not a lot of money
customer_reviews.text: High quality for not a lot of money. It works well in the setup I have.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Rozell

customer_reviews.title: " Boom Boom Boom"
customer_reviews.text: I had a 8" Yamaha and the 10" has much deeper bass almost too much, it's awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Wilburn Goss

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, good price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a replacement for another brand sub that fried an amp. This sub has great bass response, and blends nicely with my existing surround sound system. For its compact size, it has massive bass output!
customer_reviews.author: Dustin D.

customer_reviews.title: Quality product that works for both a home theater and a sterio system
customer_reviews.text: I love this speaker, produces a great sound and is worth the price in my opinion. I have it set up with my Yamaha receiver and speakers and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Ouellette

customer_reviews.title: Monster bass!
customer_reviews.text: Bigger than My old one but louder. I’m impressed with it!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Ham

customer_reviews.title: Spend the money and get the 10 inch.
customer_reviews.text: I like the individual power and controls on the back. Adjustable to different kinds of music
customer_reviews.author: Richard Shaver

customer_reviews.title: Best subwoofer for the price. Simple set up.
customer_reviews.text: Smooth powerful bass. Makes movies and music so much more enjoyable. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: ANDREW DAVIS

customer_reviews.title: Great subwoofer
customer_reviews.text: Goes really well with my onkyo receiver and onkyo and Yamaha speakers. Very powerful and deep sounds are amazing. Combine with Dolby atmos and wowza
customer_reviews.author: kevinp22

customer_reviews.title: Feels like your at a theatre
customer_reviews.text: Paired this with the Yamaha 1070 sound bar I got from Costco on sale for $119. What a combo. Very rich sound from the pair. The two compliment one another. Feels like your at a theatre.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph A. Skafar

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to a built in home theater system
customer_reviews.text: Solid strong clear bass. Perfect addition to a built in home theater system.
customer_reviews.author: JC Vegas

customer_reviews.title: # That sucks!
customer_reviews.text: It advertise Yamaha 10 inch100 powerful but, it's a 8 inch sub with 40 watts. # That sucks!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great Powered Sub
customer_reviews.text: Well worth every dollar spent. As always Yamaha always delivers the best.
customer_reviews.author: Meridian USA LLC

product_meta.title: Yamaha 10" 100W Powered Subwoofer - Black (NS-SW100BL)
product_meta.description: Style:SingleThis compact subwoofer incorporates a number of Yamaha's advanced, high-performance bass technologies, such as Twisted Flare Port, Advanced YST II (Yamaha Active Servo Technology II) with discrete amp circuitry and a high-quality 10" woofer unit. The resulting bass response is powerfully rich and impactful.
feature_bullets: New twisted flare port contributes to clear and tight bass
Advanced YST II (Yamaha Active Servo Technology II)
